text: Lewifoɔ no mu bebree faa adaka no ne adakawa a sika agudeɛ wɔ mu no, na wɔde guu ɔbotan kɛseɛ no so. Saa ɛda no, Bet-Semesfoɔ6.15 Bet-Semes yɛ Lewifoɔ kuro (Yos 21.16). Na Lewifoɔ nko ara na wɔwɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔpagya Adaka Kronkron no so de kɔ baabi foforɔ (5 Mose 10.8). bɔɔ ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne aduane afɔdeɛ bebree maa Awurade.
